name: The Annoying Button
description:
Can you out-annoy this button?

The Annoying Button is a bad and annoying game that is made to annoy you, no music, no click sound effect, no nothing! You go against this button who has 3 secrets, you'll find them out as you progress and if you weren't the one who developed this game, it may be harder depending on your luck!

There is no controls for this game, but it is recommended that you have a mouse.

If you don't have a mouse, you may not survive.. unless you're that good at using your mousepad or something. There will be PLENTY of clicking, so don't expect to not be clicking a lot, this is also why a mouse is recommended for an easier experience.

The .exe file will just install it to your hard drive, the .zip is portable, either way they both work.. just use whatever you're comfortable with more. I personally recommend the .zip for people who has never downloaded from me before unless you don't mind having it installed to your hard drive.

So uhh.. yeah. This game shouldn't take long, depends on how you play it and how much time you put into it, if you want to donate since like I could put it on steam or something its very much appreciated! I doubt it though, its too bad to be steam worth.

Modding should be capable if you use the source code, or possibly the UndertaleModTool. Don't reupload the game though, I will not allow that.

Oh yeah! Also try to play it WITHOUT an Autoclicker, if you play it without an Autoclicker and beat it, you did good!
